Name: Measurement Reference ID Code
Notes: Code identifying the broad category to which a measurement applies

Name: Measurement Qualifier
Notes: Code identifying a specific product or process characteristic to which a measurement applies

Name: Measurement Value
Notes: The value of the measurement
Remarks: R03050608: At least one of MEA-03, MEA-05, MEA-06 or MEA-08 is required

Name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
Notes: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Name: Exponent
Notes: Power to which a unit is raised
Remarks: If C001-02 is not used, its value is to be interpreted as 1.

Name: Multiplier
Notes: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value
Remarks: If C001-03 is not used, its value is to be interpreted as 1.

Name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
Notes: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Name: Exponent
Notes: Power to which a unit is raised
Remarks: If C001-05 is not used, its value is to be interpreted as 1.

Name: Multiplier
Notes: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value
Remarks: If C001-06 is not used, its value is to be interpreted as 1.

Name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
Notes: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Name: Exponent
Notes: Power to which a unit is raised
Remarks: If C001-08 is not used, its value is to be interpreted as 1.

Name: Multiplier
Notes: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value
Remarks: If C001-09 is not used, its value is to be interpreted as 1.

Name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
Notes: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Name: Exponent
Notes: Power to which a unit is raised
Remarks: If C001-11 is not used, its value is to be interpreted as 1.

Name: Multiplier
Notes: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value
Remarks: If C001-12 is not used, its value is to be interpreted as 1.

Name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
Notes: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Name: Exponent
Notes: Power to which a unit is raised
Remarks: If C001-14 is not used, its value is to be interpreted as 1.

Name: Multiplier
Notes: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value
Remarks: If C001-15 is not used, its value is to be interpreted as 1.

Name: Range Minimum
Notes: The value specifying the minimum of the measurement range
Remarks:
C0504: If MEA-05 is present, then MEA-04 is required
When citing dimensional tolerances, any measurement requiring a sign (+ or -), or any measurement where a positive (+) value cannot be assumed, use MEA05 as the negative (-) value and MEA06 as the positive (+) value.

Name: Range Maximum
Notes: The value specifying the maximum of the measurement range
Remarks: C0604: If MEA-06 is present, then MEA-04 is required

Name: Measurement Significance Code
Notes: Code used to benchmark, qualify or further define a measurement value
Remarks: L07030506: If MEA-07 is present, then at least one of MEA-03, MEA-05 or MEA-06 is required

Name: Measurement Attribute Code
Notes: Code used to express an attribute response when a numeric measurement value cannot be determined
Remarks: E0803: Only one of MEA-08 or MEA-03 may be present

Name: Surface/Layer/Position Code
Notes: Code indicating the product surface, layer or position that is being described

Name: Measurement Method or Device
Notes: The method or device used to record the measurement
